content: Hello all, first time posting here. How can I find the FHIR mandatory resources to provide within the provider directory API? Not for medical claims, but for provider directory specific to pharmacy. I'm sure it is somewhere on the FHIR build website, but I'm having trouble locating it. Thanks!
Grahame Grieve That seems to be on the right track, but is that pharmacy specific, not medical claims? I can't quite tell. Thanks!
It is intended to be generic, not only for pharmacies or payers, IIRC.
